summary:
In botany, fruit is the seed-containing part of a flower. It helps flowering plants spread their seeds. Edible fruits are a popular food source for humans and animals. They are often sweet or sour and can be eaten raw, like apples or strawberries. 

The term 'fruit' also includes some unexpected items like nuts and beans. Fruits are essential in agriculture and hold cultural significance, with many varieties grown worldwide.
title: Fruit
